memberdef.name: NIFTY_CHECK_OP
memberdef.initializer:
if(! static_cast<bool>( a op b ) ) { \ std::stringstream s; \ s << "Nifty Error: "<< message <<"
";\ s << "Nifty check : " << #a <<#op <<#b<< " failed:
"; \ s << #a " = "<<a<<"
"; \ s << #b " = "<<b<<"
"; \ s << "in file " << __FILE__ << ", line " << __LINE__ << "
"; \ throw std::runtime_error(s.str()); \ }

simplesect.para: The check is done even in Release mode (therefore if NDEBUG is defined)

memberdef.name: NIFTY_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: if(!(expression)) { \ std::stringstream s; \ s << message <<"\n";\ s << "Nifty assertion " << #expression \ << " failed in file " << __FILE__ \ << ", line " << __LINE__ << std::endl; \ throw std::runtime_error(s.str()); \ }

simplesect.para: The check is done even in Release mode (therefore if NDEBUG is defined)

parameterdescription.para: : expression which can evaluate to bool

memberdef.name: NIFTY_CHECK_EQ_TOL
NIFTY_CHECK_NUMBER
memberdef.initializer: { \ std::stringstream s; \ s << "Nifty assertion failed in file " << __FILE__ \ << ", line " << __LINE__ << std::endl; \ if(std::isnan(number))\ throw std::runtime_error(s.str()+" number is nan"); \ if(std::isinf(number))\ throw std::runtime_error(s.str()+"number is inf");\ }

memberdef.name: NIFTY_ASSERT_OP

simplesect.para: The check is only done in in Debug mode (therefore if NDEBUG is not defined)

memberdef.name: NIFTY_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer: if(!(expression)) { \ std::stringstream s; \ s << "Nifty assertion " << #expression \ << " failed in file " << __FILE__ \ << ", line " << __LINE__ << std::endl; \ throw std::runtime_error(s.str()); \ }

simplesect.para: The check is only done in in Debug mode (therefore if NDEBUG is not defined)

parameterdescription.para: : expression which can evaluate to bool
